page.title: 15TELEVISION PROGRAMMES
page.content: Nearly every home has a television set and many hours of television are watched each week. Between 4 o'clock and 6 o'clock the emphasis is on childrens' programmes. Two current favourites are Wildtrack, a nature programme, and Cartoon Time. Obviously children do not only watch at that time of day. In a survey of our Top Class the majority of programmes mentioned were screened after 8 o'clock at night. The class's favourite programme is called Magnum which is about an American Private Investigator and the second favourite was Dallas, a soap opera revolving around the fortunes and misfortunes of a Texan oil family.
